description_html: PRYZM™, a first-of-its-kind waterproof luxury flooring product, PRYZM challenges the boundaries of the hardsurface flooring category, marrying award-winning designs and unparalleled performance with new technology to create a clear winner. Beautiful design, dent - and wear-resistance, waterproof technology and quick installation are the hallmarks of this flagship product. Its ultra-dense thermoplastic core enables a smooth installation over subfloors with minor irregularities – almost no acclimation time is needed for most installations. Thermoplastic core resists pressures up to 1450 psi. Beyond that, stunning hi-resolution visuals and exceptional stability make it a winning choice for any room! It is available in 20 different designs. New PRYZM® luxury flooring is defining a new category.
